summary: Completed comprehensive testing of DXY Macro Platform B6 2-Stage Guard implementation. All critical acceptance criteria validated successfully - backend API endpoints working correctly.

routing_issues.issue: External URL (https://dxy-risk-overlay.preview.emergentagent.com) returns 404 for API endpoints
routing_issues.impact: External access not working, but localhost:8001 works perfectly
routing_issues.workaround: Backend is fully functional on localhost:8001

passed_tests: /api/health returns ok: true - Status 200, validates basic API health
/api/dxy-macro-core/health returns module: dxy-macro-core - Status 200, FRED API working, B4.3 version
Episodes validation - All 4 episodes (GFC, COVID, Tightening 2022, Low Vol 2017) with verdict.pass = true
B6 Guard Criteria: GFC CRISIS+BLOCK 80% >= 60% ✅, COVID CRISIS+BLOCK 82% >= 80% ✅
B6 Guard Criteria: Tightening 2022 BLOCK 0% <= 10% ✅, Low Vol 2017 NONE 100% >= 80% ✅
Stability validation - Guard flips 3.65/year <= 4 ✅, 95 total flips, 21d median duration
Macro score endpoint - Composite score -0.062 with 10 components working
Credit context endpoint - Credit composite score -0.069 functional
Housing context endpoint - Housing composite score 0.025 functional
Activity context endpoint - Activity composite score 0.002 functional
Macro series list endpoint - 22 total series, 16 loaded successfully
action_item_for_main_agent: External URL routing issue: API endpoints return 404 on https://dxy-risk-overlay.preview.emergentagent.com but work perfectly on localhost:8001. This is a deployment/ingress configuration issue, not a backend functionality issue. All B6 2-Stage Guard acceptance criteria are met.
